description: This file defines a React functional component called CandidatesPage, which manages display and filtering of candidate profiles, including states for filters, loading, error handling, and user interactions such as accept/reject actions.

methods.name: CandidatesPage
methods.description: Main React component managing candidates listing, filtering, and user interaction.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Function to fetch profile data based on current filters and update state accordingly.

methods.name: onAccept
methods.description: Handles candidate acceptance by updating accepted set.

methods.name: onReject
methods.description: Handles candidate rejection by updating rejected set.
